          <title>
            <string language="en">Centripetal force on a train in a circular track</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zentripetale Kraft auf einer Serie in einer 
kreisförmigen Spur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force centripète sur un train dans une piste 
circulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força centripetal em um trem em uma trilha 
circular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza centripeta su un treno in una pista 
circolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεντρομόλος δύναμη σε ένα τραίνο σε μια κυκλική 
διαδρομή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza centrípeta en un tren en una pista 
circular</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the centripetal force (bottom) acting on a train moving in a circular track (top).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centripetal force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die zentripetale Kraft 
(unter) fungierend auf einer Serie, die in einer kreisförmigen Spur 
(Oberseite) bewegt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre la force centripète 
(inférieure) agissant sur un train se déplaçant dans une piste 
circulaire (dessus).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra a força centripetal (inferior) 
que age em um trem que move-se em uma trilha circular (alto).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra la forza centripeta 
(inferiore) che si comporta su un treno che si muove in una pista 
circolare (parte superiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει κεντρομόλο δύναμη 
(κατώτατο σημείο) ενεργώντας σε ένα τραίνο που κινείται σε μια 
κυκλική διαδρομή (κορυφή).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra la fuerza centrípeta 
(inferior) que actúa en un tren que se mueve en una pista circular 
(tapa).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zentripetale Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
